nodes.text: A shop was operated by the outlaw tech group TechTank on the lower levels of the moon Nar Shaddaa, concealed inside the holding tank of a large water processing center. During the Galactic Civil War, the Hutt crime lord Sinasu became engaged in a gang war with his rival Noako and he went into hiding in TechTank. However, a member of Sinasu's organization betrayed his location and the shop fell under attack from Cordol's Chain, a bounty hunter group that was working for Noako.
